Description: King Shishak of Egypt despoiling the Temple; with his troops at right, one of the soldiers carrying the ark. Illustration to 'Biblia cum concordantiis veteris et novi testamenti...' Lyons: Jacques Sacon for Anton Koberger, 1518. Woodcut
Curator's comments: From a set of 44 woodcut illustrations.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (I.8.44)
Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (Undescribed)
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Temple of Jerusalem
Acquisition name: Purchased from: C G Boerner (sale CLIV Leipzig 4/6.v.1927/1159, 28M for 49 prints)
